Remember me for 30 days: Ka tuna da ni tsawon kwanaki 30
Whitefield Foundation is passionately co: Gidauniyar Whitefield ta himmatu wajen kawar da talauci a Afirka musamman Najeriya ta hanyar karfafa tattalin arziki.
Build employability, entrepreneurship an: Gina guraben aikin yi, kasuwanci da samar da kuɗi tare da darussan da masana da ƙwararru ke koyarwa kyauta cikin sauƙin fahimta kuma a aikace.
Professional development from the best p: Ci gaban ƙwararru daga mafi kyawun mutane.
Learn different skills with one subscrip: Koyi fasaha daban-daban tare da biyan kuɗi ɗaya.
Interact with profesionals and people li: Yi hulɗa tare da ƙwararru da mutane kamar ku akan kowane batu.
On developing a business plan and gettin: A kan haɓaka tsarin kasuwanci da samun lamuni don fara kasuwanci.Na koyi zama mai mai da hankali ga wasu don kaiwa ga sama. Haka kuma a kan wane ne ni, yanzu na san cewa ni wata halitta ce ta musamman wacce ba ta buƙatar yin kwafin wani don cimma burina a rayuwa.
This course has opened my eyes and offer: Wannan kwas ɗin ya buɗe idanuna kuma ya ba ni damar yin amfani da abubuwan da nake da su sosai. Na sami damar samun ilimi kan ayyukan da za su bunƙasa a nan gaba, kula da tsarin lissafin kuɗi mai kyau a cikin ƙungiya, da kuma yadda ake amfani da kafofin watsa labarun don haɓaka damar kasuwanci tsakanin sauran mutane.
Great lessons. What I learnt here cannot: Manyan darussa. Ba za a iya samun abin da na koya a nan a cikin babbar manhajar karatu ba. Na koyi abubuwa da yawa a kan gano ko ni wanene ta hanyar gwajin mutumtaka Ta hanyar tambayar mutane game da kaina. Na koyi cewa cancanta kaɗai ba za ta iya nuna maka ba amma ƙwarewar da ka samu na iya kai ka zuwa matsayi mafi girma.
